keywords_explanation_array: "A membrane-bound large structure inside a living cell that controls the cell metabolism and reproduction.","A threadlike structure found in the nucleus of most living cells, carrying genetic information in the form of,genes.","Deoxyribonucleic acid, a self-replicating material that carries individual hereditary characteristics in a cell, the main constituent of chromosomes. ","A cell containing a membrane-bound nucleus and organelles.","The viscous liquid inside a cell but outside the cell's nucleus.","The double-layered membrane enclosing the nucleus of a cell. ","The fluid within the nucleus of a eukaryotic cell surrounding the chromosomes and nucleolus. ","The material that makes up the chromosomes of eukaryotes. ","A spherical granule in the nucleus composed of protein and RNA; synthesizes ribosomes."
